content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the structure of the first eight lines of the poem?

choices.label: The speaker reveals discontent through a constantly changing meter.
The speaker uses two contrasting scenarios to identify two competing points of view.
The speaker represents his love through a series of increasingly intense images.
The speaker interweaves two figurative comparisons that convey an emotional predicament.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
